channel.title: Challenge
channel.description:
Hey,
Can anyone tell me how to make a "duel" option for a specific spot (the actual duel arena spot) so that when you're in there and right click someone it says duel. but i wana know how to make it only there and not everywhere u go. and where to type what happens when u do it.
Thanks..

item.title: Challenge
item.dc:creator: @pwned_i_lvl3 pwned i lvl3
item.description:
@pwned_i_lvl3 wrote:

where do i add this?

Read full topic

item.title: Challenge
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

Duel option has to be replaced on top of Attack option when you enter dueling arena… and when player clicks duel it will attack player but add some checks so inside dueling arena you don’t attack but you send chllange duel screen…

    outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
    outStream.writeByteC(3);		// command slot(does it matter which one?)
    outStream.writeByteA(0);		// 0 or 1; 0 if command should be placed on top in context menu
    outStream.writeString("Duel");
    outStream.endFrameVarSize();

Read full topic
